website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable option that pays for itself with longevity.
pros: Has comfortable construction that holds up to heavy weight and stands up well to rain, wind, and weather
Perfect for outdoor use and an attractive property addition
cons: Difficult assembly can lead to a wobbly design

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy bench!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is perfect! Sturdy & attractive. I would also agree with those that said the color is off from the listing photo. Mine is all black, that doesn't bother me. It may be a factor for your decision. It took my husband only a few minutes to assemble. No cursing so the instructions must have been pretty good. 😉 I plan on buying one or two more to put throughout my garden.
customer_reviews.author: JHan

customer_reviews.title: Great bench!
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with this bench. It was easy to assemble, looks a lot more expensive than it is, and has been holding up nicely in the elements. It sits, uncovered, in our backyard. It is also very comfortable. We have two porch swings, padded lawn chairs, and zero gravity chairs yet we always seem to find ourselves choosing to sit on this bench to relax. We looked at a lot of benches in the stores, and I'm so glad we went with this one!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.  Quite happy with bench on our patio.
customer_reviews.text: Received this bench in good order. Coppery color is very nice and looks good with redwood deck. Not difficult to put together while not a breeze either. It does take some effort to assemble but it is not unmanageable for something this size and weight. Rubber feet with adjustments make leveling very easy. Bench is extremely sturdy. No problems. Glad I got it. I recommend it. Have fun.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Looking for a bench - this is it
customer_reviews.text: We live it..so much so that we now have 3. Assembles in minutes. Does not rust and holds up well to the tough Michigan weather.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Donehue

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty Bench and Sturdy, Too!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bench to put in our flower bed at the front of the house, so that my husband and I could have a place to sit occasionally in the evenings. It looks amazing, and we are already enjoying it! I needed something that would support the two of us, and the weight limit was higher on this bench than many I looked at on Amazon. It supports two average adults without any problem. It wasn't as wide as I thought it would be, but there is still plenty of room for us both to sit side by side.
customer_reviews.author: D. Walker

customer_reviews.title: The bolt holes lined up on one side but not ...
customer_reviews.text: The bolt holes lined up on one side but not on the other. As a result, the bolt had to go in at an angle, and of course, it couldn't go in all the way. Very frustrating. But at least it held. Also, the color is not what's shown in the photo. It's black. But I wanted cast aluminum, and it's attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Kicker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful solid, heavy bench!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really excited about this bench. I wanted one that was aluminum so I wouldn't have to worry about rust, but I didn't want to worry about it blowing away either. This bench is around 35 pounds and is very sturdy. It says you'll need two people for assembly, but I was able to do it rather easily by myself. The color is a little more black than the coppery picture on the listing, but I bet after it's exposed to the elements a bit it will lighten up. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Keri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bench. Went together easily
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench. Went together easily. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the hardware designed to hold it together does not seem very sturdy. It will probably hold up fine as an occasional seat, but with constant usage, I expect it'll get wobbly. Update (10 months of use): pleased and surprised that the bench is still very sturdy! It gets dragged around and no problems, so am upgrading it to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: arzee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice benches at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench for my barn and liked it so much, ended up buying 3 more! I put two together by myself and my husband put the other two together. He was sitting on one of e benches in the living room and said he loved how comfortable it is. We have two in our barn and two in our backyard on either side of the fire pit. I can't speak to the longevity of the benches since we've only had them a short time but they are pretty and very comfortable and can sit two easily.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice sturdy and beautiful bench. It looks lovely in my courtyard by the fountain and we know from experience that aluminum is the way to go. It's lightweight and impervious to the elements. No rust to worry about or repainting every few years. Just hose it off and it looks like new. In Louisiana the humidity, rain and sultry summers take a toll on outdoor furniture. We have similar dining tables and chairs which have been sitting outside for 5 years and still look like new. This is a great price for this bench too. UPDATE: May 2013, still loving this bench, but I need another one and its no longer available. Please bring this item back!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Quality Bench
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bench to sit at the base of a flag pole we just erected in front of our clubhouse. It is both very attractive and makes a great addition to our flagpole area. Have had many compliments on it. It is very sturdy and well made. A great addition to our flag pole area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality bench, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bench with first rate fit and finish. Easy to assemble but you really need to use a better phillips head screwdriver and wrench than are in the kit to get the fasteners fully tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped quickly in excellent packaging. Easy to put together. The parts were labeled and sorted in a neat package. The bench itself seems to be high quality and sturdy. I am still unsure if the price matches the quality. I had high expectations but it is still much better than the cheap ones that you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Welcoming addition
customer_reviews.text: We received this bench in the Spring to serve as an attractive addition to our small front porch. I’m very happy we bought it as it is good sturdy quality at a reasonable price. The paint job and finish are nicely done and looks clean. It’s fairly heavy in weight, but not too heavy you can’t move it. The size is right for 2 adults comfortably and fits nicely in small spaces. I added some colorful pillows, and it makes a warm welcome to visitors, or the UPS driver to deliver our Amazon packages!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa MLK

customer_reviews.title: Lovely finish and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bench and easy to put together. Already in our garden. Great value! My only suggestion is that the box was marked shiny copper in many locations. Almost didn’t open and thought we would send back but decided to open. Some people may not.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great Porch Bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Fits perfectly on my small porch. Added a red cushion for some "pop". The bench was easy to put together and is very sturdy. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and seems very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and seems very sturdy. Since we've placed this out under a tree, it is also easy to clean off. It is quite attractive in our front yard. Just waiting to enjoy this more in the summer when our weather warms up.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Shopper

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.  WAS EASY TO PUT TOGETHER, LOOKS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: FOUR STEPS AND ITS PUT TOGETHER, WELL MADE LOOKS GREAT, AND FOR THE PRICE?? CANT BEAT IT. WEATHER PROOF LOOKS GREAT AT THE HOUSE ENTRANCE. VERY HAPPY CUSTOMER DG
customer_reviews.author: Aviva

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, beautiful bench.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, the way it looks and the way it went together so easily. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: the landscaper

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: We have a very small porch but This fits perfect in the space. It’s not too heavy but it is sturdy. My husband and I are both big but fit on it nicely. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Strong and light weight
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this bench. We have it sitting outside at our "sunset point", which is on a concrete patio. For it's amazingly light weight, it holds us with ease...probably around 400 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: David Obergoenner

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: We love the color - a black with bronze streaks. Sturdy & easy to assemble. Comfortable to sit on. Glad we bought it A great value.
customer_reviews.author: LJ Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous bench-great price-quick delivery-you are wonderful Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: The bench arrived on Saturday and my husband assembled it Sunday morning. It was simple to assemble-it seemed a bit shaky at first as he was putting it together-but now it seems fine. It looks FABULOUS in our courtyard outside our front door! We couldn't be happier-thank you so much Amazon for the great price, the great product and the speedy delivery!
customer_reviews.author: JanC-FL

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition to the garden . . .
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and attractive. Looks good in a corner of my yard and is actually fairly comfortable for sitting. Pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Replay888

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: I brought 10 of these for church. It remains to be seen how they will weather outside.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on our patio next to the garden. Reasonably comfortable for sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Willjr

customer_reviews.title: Standng the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: I h ave had 2 of these for a few years now - and they are awesome. Beautiful and holding up so well.
customer_reviews.author: MFHillyer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this bench!
customer_reviews.text: It only took my husband about 10 minutes to assemble. This bench is beautiful and very classy! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Dubord

customer_reviews.title: Great look, very easy to assemble alone and sturdy enough for 2 adults.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bistro table and 2 chairs one week ago. I love it and we decided to buy the bench from the same brand. It was very easy to assemble it. Although the manual says you need to be two, you absolutely can do it alone. All the pieces fit well together. For the price, I am seriously amazed by the quality. The bench is a bit darker than on the picture, I prefer to mention it. Overall, I am VERY pleased with our new bench.
customer_reviews.author: D. G.

customer_reviews.title: Good bench at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. All parts were there and took about 15 minutes. Very solid and not too bad to sit on. However, we are using this primarily as a decorative piece on our front porch during the winter months. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. F. Uhlenhake

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Garden Bench
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bench! Sturdy and the finish on it is beautiful. Perfect for a garden setting.
customer_reviews.author: Kristianne Thomas

customer_reviews.title: An absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is really a pretty bench for our front yard area. A bit different, in a good way, and rather eye-catching. The color is perfect! Almost black but a glint of copper/bronze in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: PatS

customer_reviews.title: Check the production, otherwise nice piece
customer_reviews.text: The bench is quite nice for the price, except for one defect in the production. I am not able to insert one bold on the back as there is no hole for the bolt in the side piece. The punch mark is there, but the hole was not created. Because of the design, the bench back is sturdy enough without it, and it would be too much bother to return. Otherwise, it really is quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Word Fan

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! Perfect for viewing the garden and enjoying the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: rb

customer_reviews.title: Not as asverised
customer_reviews.text: Like the bench, but the color isn't as advertised. It looks like dark brown, instead of antique. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Great bench and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench, wanted one for my yard and I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, light weight but sturdy - gotta love it.
customer_reviews.text: We live near the beach and this cast aluminum garden bench is exactly what we're looking for. Easy assembly, lightweight but sturdy and will not rust ever - and the price is just right!! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: No maintenance bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bench. It looks great on the porch and there is no maintenance!! No more painting and replacing wood for me! It is lightweight for moving around but not too light to be blown away. The color is nice too! Very nice quality bench.
customer_reviews.author: 2forGaga

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this bench. Sturdy, attractive. Only small complaint is that it was not as long as I wanted. Fits 2 people well though! As for comfort, it’s good. You may want to invest in a cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A. Kunkle

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We have it on our patio and it looks great. It's a smaller size so it doesn't take up a lot of room. The color is a deep darker bronze and goes with just about anything. The seat is comfortable to sit on without a pillow. It is stable and well made. A good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MoveeBuff

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy outdoor bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! We bought as a gift for a friend and they thought it was great. I might buy another one for our yard!
customer_reviews.author: A.Barger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little bench
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little bench. Easy to assemble. Strong and stable yet fairly light and easy to move around. It may seem odd to talk about a metal bench being comfortable but it actually is quite comfortable. The aluminum casting appears to be very good so I expect this bench to last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Photo is not representative of actual product -
customer_reviews.text: The photo is very misleading. This bench we received is BLACK with very minimal copper color showing. We will have to paint it. It is sturdy and should last a while.
customer_reviews.author: realtime

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and color
customer_reviews.text: This arrived very well packed. Everything wrapped and padded to avoid scratches. It went together reasonably easy, with spare nuts and bolts included. It was going to sit on uneven flagstone so we really appreciated the built in levelors. The size and color were exactly as depicted and just what we wanted for our porch.
customer_reviews.author: TommyT

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy!  A perfect combo!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is adorable, it looks great on my front lawn. It's comfy and not too heavy so it's easy to move from one place to another if you want to get out of the sun and under some shade depending on the time of day yet it's sturdy enough to stay put AND it was easy to assemble. Can't ask for anything more!
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Missing peices
customer_reviews.text: I got it to work but it was missing a screw, and the bolt holes didn't line up well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench. Sturdy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench. Sturdy and well designed. Easy to assemble with no fitment issues. Comfortable and pleasant to view in yard setting. A very good value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great in my garden
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 1 1/2 years ago and it is strong and sturdy. Still looks great after being outside in my Texas landscape.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy them again!
customer_reviews.text: Sits firm, sturdy, easy to put together. Bought 2, both are sitting outside under the trees and are weathering fine. If I needed them, I would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: A Wellcher

customer_reviews.title: Attractive sturdy bench!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. Sittng on it right now as I write this review! Very sturdy and attractive. No loss in color sitting in the sun over the last two years. Eau setup too.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: Description says for outdoor use. Instructions when you receive say NOT for outdoor use. Confused?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bought 4 for around the walking path in our little ...
customer_reviews.text: bought 4 for around the walking path in our little over 55 community.--every one pleased--sturdy but light enough to move easily--comfy-nice color--like a burnished copper--put together myself--easy--peasy
customer_reviews.author: sheila ross

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and material look durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and material look durable. The only thing I find out , this bench is kinda shorter than most my regular benches . Overall a nice metal non rust bench to sit by my yard.
customer_reviews.author: AJT

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Affordable, comfortable( with cushion). Sturdy enough. Looks great. Easy assembly. Not too big for our narrow porch.
customer_reviews.author: Jettata

customer_reviews.title: BEST Cozumel Metal Bench, Antique Copper Finish
customer_reviews.text: I am 100% pleased with this bench! Well packaged, all parts carefully wrapped, good visual instructions for assembly. Fairly quickly assembled by 2 people. Exactly as pictured in the photo, it looks fantastic on my patio sitting alongside the front door which has a heavy metal screen door with southwest decor. I'm sure it would look equally attractive and functional along a garden path to sit and enjoy the view. Comfortably seats 2. I love the contours and sturdy yet graceful lines of the arm rests leading down into the legs of the bench.
customer_reviews.author: arizona adobe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful garden bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is a superior quality, finish and quite beautiful. It's a nice size and was easy to assemble, actually my teen grandchildren assembled it for me. I would highly recommend this item.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The bench arrived on schedule and was assembled by my 21 year old grandson. It sits right outside my front door and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Not a copper finish !!
customer_reviews.text: Not copper, not even bronze .....looks more black with very very little specks of copper, not at all like the picture !! Not happy with this purchase !!
customer_reviews.author: bruce a softley

customer_reviews.title: Very charming!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on our front porch. I put it together in about 20 mins by myself, but would suggest a partner. Only down side is the seating length. Double check the tightness of your screws to ensure the bench seats evenly.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID J. CARDONE

customer_reviews.title: Great. Handsome. Great for back.
customer_reviews.text: You'll want to sit on this comfortable bench. It aligns your spine (sit up straight, don't slouch), helps get rid of lower back pain. Because of its coloring you can use it indoors or out. Seats two.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGrath

customer_reviews.title: I have had this bench for a year now and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this bench for a year now and it looks as new as when I first bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Offutt

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for me
customer_reviews.text: Bench looks good. It is easy to assemble and no damage from shipping. The bench is a little wobbly so be careful with two heavy set people on it.
customer_reviews.author: POOH-WABBIT

customer_reviews.title: Great cast aluminum bench
customer_reviews.text: This is my third bench. Very sturdy for the price and I love that it's aluminum and won't rust like steel or deteriorate like wood. Directions aren't very helpful, but with only 8 screw sets to put in, it isn't rocket science to figure out how to do it. I supported the seat on a stool with books to get it to the right height. This allowed me to attach the arms and then the back easily.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: sit awhile
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our side yard. Generous size and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just put them together today. I chose them based on the reviews in terms of comfort and the reviewers were right on. The bench is very comfortable. Easy to put together but good to have a second person helping. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KMI

customer_reviews.title: However I love the look and comfort of this bench
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned the bench long enough to judge its durability otherwise I would have given a 5 star rating. However I love the look and comfort of this bench. We are considering ordering a second bench. Beautiful design. Peanuts
customer_reviews.author: Peanuts

customer_reviews.title: And comfortable. Need to follow the minimal instructions exactly to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and attractive. And comfortable. Need to follow the minimal instructions exactly to assemble, as I discovered.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lipsey

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: The seller for this product is fine. Thank you for a speedy delivery. Item arrived in good condition. Packaged well. Easy to assemble. Looks like the photo. But here's the thing, this is total, complete junk. It wobbles and barely seems like it can hold two average sized people. I expect this will fall apart the first time anyone heavy sits on it. Also, the packaging indicates that this product should not be exposed to rain or direct sunshine. I bought this to go in a scening location in my garden. Too much of a hassle to try to remove it so I'll just see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: Clytemnestra

customer_reviews.title: A really good looking bench that is fairly easy to assemble with ...
customer_reviews.text: A really good looking bench that is fairly easy to assemble with 2 people. Less than 30 minutes. Well constructed and shipping was quick and the materials were well packed and protected. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas G. Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love my beautiful bench! It is classy and sturdy. I have owned this bench for over 2 years now and it looks as beautiful as the day that we put this bench together. It really does class up my front porch!
customer_reviews.author: Eliesha Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Great Cast Aluminum Bench
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish are excellent, and it took no time at all to assemble. Best price I have seen by far for cast aluminum. Looks fantastic in our back yard and no rust worries.
customer_reviews.author: Richard3107

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful yard bench at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Solid as a rock; I saw this beautiful bench somewhere else but it was a little too expensive. The price was very fair on Amazon, making me feel good about my purchase. It will be perfect for our yard come Spring
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any yard, porch or garden!
customer_reviews.text: IMy husbnd gave me this lovely bench for my garden as a birthday gift. It really adds a nice touch to my garden and it is very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: susan edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bench is well made and adorable. It won't seat more than two people but that is what we needed. We placed it under a tree on the top of a grassy hill so we can sit and watch our new lab puppy play.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: A REAL BEAUTY
customer_reviews.text: This bench looks fantastic on my front porch. It was easy to put together and is very sturdy. Overall a great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful. Easy to assemble. And it's aluminum so it shouldn't rust here in this hot and humid weather.
customer_reviews.author: Linda O Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this bench. It looks great on our patio.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn

customer_reviews.title: Zozumel Cast Aluminum Bench
customer_reviews.text: Great/sturdy bench. Very pleased with it. It seems to be very durable and will withstand weather conditions. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble however
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble however, the wholes for the volts didn't align so I had to improvise and make the holes match to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Two winters in and this bench is holding up nice. Easy to put together my wife and I use this daily in the spring, summer and fall with no worries. Made to last!
customer_reviews.author: faygo19

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly.....a second pair of hands helped. All parts present and everything fit. Looks.great on our outdoor patio.
customer_reviews.author: Keith K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bench
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases from Amazon! This bench is solid, easy to put together and easy to wipe down. If you are wanting a comfortable bench, this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks beautiful, easy to assemble, made to last. what's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Chris Yates

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bench
customer_reviews.text: Good looking bench. Sturdier than I thought. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It's great bench. Fit perfectly on our porch. Hope it will last for long.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Trencanova

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great item !!!! Easy to put together , very nice looking , I thought it was bigger then it is only fits 2 people, but it's still nice and fits perfect were I put it. Just a little expensive for the size of it.
customer_reviews.author: D.CAR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bench
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this to fit into an arbor we have in the backyard. It is perfect! The color is great and it is comfortable to sit in. I put it together myself before my husband came home from work because I am good with tools and it only took about 1/2 hour. Don't use the screwdriver that comes with this kit - use a regular Phillips head screwdriver because the plastic one is too small and it strips out of the handle. Very sturdy and well made. Out of all the smaller size benches available on Amazon, I would strongly recommend this one for quality and for price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandlib

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fairly easy to assemble & just the perfect size & finish for my front porch.
customer_reviews.author: Camille W.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Assembly was a little more difficult than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Assembly was a little more difficult than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Muir

customer_reviews.title: A good rustproof bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is a good value; it was easy to assemble, looks good, and feels sturdy when sat in. One big plus for SoCal- there aren't nooks and crannies on the bench to harbor black widow spiders.....
customer_reviews.author: gray mare

customer_reviews.title: Solid bench
customer_reviews.text: This is for our front patio and we couldn't be happier with it. It was easy to put together, and it so sturdy it feels like it was molded as a single piece.
customer_reviews.author: MNMark

customer_reviews.title: love the look of this bench
customer_reviews.text: love the look of this bench. all metal ,old school house look. so far pretty sturdy. easy to assemble. I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assemply
customer_reviews.text: This bench replaced a weathered wooden bench - It looks marvelous underneath my tree. It only took 15 minutes to assemble and that was me working alone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Collier

customer_reviews.title: This is an amazingly comfortable bench, with its design exquisitely contouring to one's ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazingly comfortable bench, with its design exquisitely contouring to one's body so sitting on metal mesh actually feel comfortable for bottom and back. It was well crafted and very very easy to assemble. It is sturdy and makes looking out at my garden a pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: rochelle beck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bench. So easy to put together and very sturdy. Looks great in our yard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench for lake front and economical.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something to place near lake front that was comfortable to sit on, sturdy for several years use, easy to move, could take outdoor elements and not be extremely expensive. After one season of use, it's meeting our requirements. We purchased 2 and are quite pleased. The assembly was quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Eakin

customer_reviews.title: nice sturdy bench
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bench right out of the box. Easy to put together (if all the nuts and bolts would be there) and so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sturdy bench! Easy assembly, but do need two people- one to hold while the other one attaches screws.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Bench. Easy to assemble and looks great on out front porch!
customer_reviews.author: Red11

product_meta.title: Best Selling Cozumel Cast Aluminum Bench, Antique Copper Finish
product_meta.description:
Catch a summer breeze or watch the birds from your lovely Maldives Outdoor Bench from BEST. Built to last with cast aluminum construction and a weather-resistant finish, this sturdy bench will give you years of enjoyment. The comfortable seating is perfect for reading a book or listening to the sounds of nature.

AMAZON.COM


BEST COZUMEL CAST ALUMINUM BENCH, ANTIQUE COPPER FINISH
PERFECT BENCH FOR ONE OR TWO PEOPLE
This copper finished aluminum bench is as pretty as a picture. You can imagine a snapshot of it being the focal point of a postcard set in a lush garden with shade trees, blooming flowers in all the colors of a rainbow and a wooden foot bridge in the background. It makes a very romantic statement with plenty of sitting room for two. The cast aluminum construction is quite sturdy and is rust proof which helps if you plan to leave it outdoors. It would look perfectly at home in the backyard with several stone rabbits or other furry creatures scattered in front of it. It weighs only 37 pounds which makes it stable but still light enough to move from the yard to the patio and even to the screened porch. It would make an excellent seating area for guests who come for a cookout or just to sit a visit in the cool fall air. Since it is so versatile and easy to move, during the "off season" you can place it by your front door and decorate it with pumpkins and fall foliage for Halloween and Thanksgiving. Santa would find this a perfect place to sit throughout the Christmas holidays. 

 * 22.8 inches in Length, 40.2 inches in Width and 32.7 inches High
 * Cast Aluminum Construction
 * Antique Copper Finish
 * Simple elegant Design
 * Perfect for Garden, Patio, and Balcony
feature_bullets: Cast aluminum construction with antique copper finish
Perfect for garden entry or outdoor living space
Simple yet elegant design; some assembly required
